title: Harley Quinn: The Animated Series: The Eat. Bang! Kill. Tour #5
description: While Ivy starts reflecting on what's been happening these last few months after leaving Kite Man at the altar and joining Harley Quinn for a de facto, impromptu honeymoon across the DCU, new villain Mephitic makes himself known to Harley and Ivy at the Black Cat Lounge.
author: Tee Franklin
